Interface: CompositionCollection

CompositionCollection

A CompositionCollection represents the list of domain objects contained by another domain object. It provides methods for loading this list asynchronously, modifying this list, and listening for changes to this list.

Usage:

 var myViewComposition = MCT.composition.get(myViewObject);
 myViewComposition.on('add', addObjectToView);
 myViewComposition.on('remove', removeObjectFromView);
 myViewComposition.load(); // will trigger `add` for all loaded objects.
Source:
  • api/composition/CompositionCollection.js, line 28

Members

add

Add a domain object to this composition.

A call to load must have resolved before using this method.

Source:
  • api/composition/CompositionCollection.js, line 172

remove

Remove a domain object from this composition.

A call to load must have resolved before using this method.

Source:
  • api/composition/CompositionCollection.js, line 221

remove

Reorder the domain objects in this composition.

A call to load must have resolved before using this method.

Source:
  • api/composition/CompositionCollection.js, line 241
